values.fieldLabel: What challenges do you need help with?
values.placeholder: Detail the challenges your experiencing in your business.

assignments.name: challenges
assignments.value: ={{ $json['What challenges do you need help with?'] }}

parameters.content: # Update Lead Info will call summary

values.combineMapPrompt:
=Write a concise summary of the following:


"{{ $json.body.call.transcript }}"


CONCISE SUMMARY:
values.prompt:
=Write a concise summary of the following:


"{{ $json.body.call.transcript }}"


CONCISE SUMMARY:

call.transcript:
Agent: Hello, this is David from Amplify Automation.
User: Hi.
Agent: Hi, am I speaking with Bob?
User: Yes.
Agent: Hello Bob, this is David from Amplify Automation. I am an AI voice assistant, I'm following up on your enquiry from our website regarding the challenges you've been facing in your business. Is now a good time to talk?
User: No. I'm not interested anymore.
User: Thank you.
Agent: Totally fine. I’ll try again another time. Thanks and take care!

Totally fine. I’ll try again another time. Thanks and take care!

Hi, am I speaking with Bob?

Hello Bob, this is David from Amplify Automation. I am an AI voice assistant, I'm following up on your enquiry from our website regarding the challenges you've been facing in your business. Is now a good time to talk?

call_analysis.call_summary: The call was initiated by an AI voice assistant named David, who was following up on an inquiry made by the user, Bob. However, Bob expressed that he is no longer interested in the conversation and declined to continue. The agent acknowledged this and ended the call politely.
